extendedInfo.description: The NEO A&M College app give you instant access to your news, grades, online courses, maps, sports, neo.edu, calendar, NEO's Youtube channel, and Facebook.Features:- Campus News: The lates events at NEO with official press releases and vibrant photos.- Access your grades: Get the information you need quick from Web Product on the go.- NEO Online Courses: Access important information, check assignment due dates, and more.- Maps: Never be without one again. You'll always know your way around campus.- Sports: Stay up to date on all the latest Norse sporting events with quick access to neoathletics.com.- neo.edu: With our integrated browser you can surf NEO's full website without ever leaving the app.- Youtube: All things NEO A&M College at the NEOcollege channel.- Facebook: Keep in touch with news, events, classmates, faculty, and staff on our page.- Calendar - Scroll through NEO's complete calendar of events.
